main_text.sentence: DNA sequencing was carried out using the dideoxy-mediated chain termination method [28].
Burning in tall grass (hotter fires) may be detrimental to the germination of seeds [18] while cooler fires may be sufficient to break dormancy and cause germination.
Topographically precise termination is provided by producing additional interstitial branches in the ML direction [31,32,37,38].
It is assumed that this facilitates visual processing, which involves wiring local to the termination zone [5].
Some Acacia species are temperature specific, suggesting a temperature threshold for germination [18,20].
The promoter containing fragment cloned in pVMB5 was sequenced by dideoxy chain termination method [33] as already described [34].
